attributes.action: Require advertisers to clearly display the full range of prices for a product or service, instead of misleading consumers by displaying only the lowest price.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We all know the scam.  "Fly to Barcelona from 99p".  Of course that will not be the price you pay, there's very few seats at that price, and most of them will cost considerably more.  

The legislation we hereby petition for would require the example slogan to read "Fly to Barcelona from 99p to £249."
